timeline.message:
feat(CR-UI): Enhancement & Bug fixes

Signed-off-by: Abdul Kapti <abdul.mannankapti@siemens.com>

timeline.body:
Use Platform-Independent Line Separators wherever possible.
`System.lineSeparator()`
timeline.bodyText:
Use Platform-Independent Line Separators wherever possible.
System.lineSeparator()
timeline.bodyHTML:
Use Platform-Independent Line Separators wherever possible.
System.lineSeparator()
timeline.author: JaideepPalit

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
feat(ui-rest): Changes in Release information   * change title "Download URL" to "Source Code Download URL"   * add new data filed "Binary Download URL"   * added new field in excel sheet
fix(mergeComponentRelease): Attachments not linked properly from source component/Release
fix(LicenseInfo): Optimized loading of license info, source code download, Clearing report page
Merge pull request #1095 from siemens/fix/mergeCompRelWithAttchmnt
fix(excelexport): Projects with linked releases excel export error

fix(OrtIntegration): Fix client to perform case insensitive search of component.   * Set default componentType to OSS in Client.   * Fix duplicate check to case insensitive during create new component
feat(AttachmentVirusScan): Store attachment to File System asynchronously, handle saving of large multi-part attachments. Fix test cases
feat(ProjectUI): feature to display the source files linked with the licenses
feat(cloudant): Migrating from ektorp to cloudant java client
feat(components-pagination): paginated view response for components
Merge pull request #1188 from siemens/feat/LicenseToSourceFileMapping-1052
REST: Wrong error handling when deleting multiple components #851
feat(log): Added output processing of the change log
fix(log): Fix indentation issue in source code.
feat(UI): CLI file clean up assistant
fix(rest): Get component by name case insensitive
fix(release): Fixed mainline state is empty when creating a release by ui or rest
feat(ui): Added new Clearing State and Attachment Type
fix(ui): Restrict visibility of each component/release like Project
fix(api): Correct the ECC status when release is created by API
fix(ReleaseClearingState): ClearingState not changing to New from Scan Available
Merge pull request #1453 from toshiba/release/bug-fix_release_ecc_status_auto_set_value
fix(merge): Optimized code to check for write permission of release and components before starting to merge
feat(export): Enable mailing for exported spreadsheet for components
feat(UI): ModifiedOn & MOdifiedBy fields for Project/COmponent/Release
Merge pull request #1539 from siemens/feat/ModifiedOnAndModifiedByFields-1479
fix(ecc): Script to cleanup ECC information in release
feat(SPDX): Use new SPDX library (#1496)
Merge pull request #1594 from toshiba/releases/feature-update_library_spdx
fix(ecc): Reset Ecc Fields when Component type is changed.
Merge pull request #1655 from siemens/fix/eccStatus
feat(svm): Publish SVM codes to Community
feat(rest) : Update data without moderation request And This features' a configurable setting
feat(clearing): Improved cloud backend clearing
feat(SPDX): Making new tab in component release pages for showing SPDX/SPDX Lite data #1240
feat(api): endpoint get vulnerabilities of a component
feat(api): Endpoint get release overview by component
Merge pull request #1923 from siemens/feat/CloudBackendClearing
Merge pull request #1943 from toshiba/release/feature-api_get_all_release_by_component

timeline.body: Use `int` to prevent `Autoboxing` and `Unboxing` during increment and then convert it to string.
timeline.bodyText: Use int to prevent Autoboxing and Unboxing during increment and then convert it to string.
timeline.bodyHTML: Use int to prevent Autoboxing and Unboxing during increment and then convert it to string.
timeline.author: JaideepPalit

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
feat(ProjectTodo): Remove ProjectTodo and UI changes for Obligation and ProjectTodo
feat(projectEdit): Project creators and moderators can edit few fields in a closed project
fix(LicenseInfo): Optimized loading of license info, source code download, Clearing report page
fix(excelexport): Projects with linked releases excel export error
feat(PredefinedTags):Predefined tags per group in the Projects Tag field.
feat(AttachmentVirusScan): Store attachment to File System asynchronously, handle saving of large multi-part attachments. Fix test cases
feat(cloudant): Migrating from ektorp to cloudant java client
feat(ClearingRequestUI): Bug fixes and enhancement
feat(ui): Added support to add external URLs to project

feat(SVM): Added new field enableSvm(Default value - true) for linked project.   * Request/Response structure of get_projects_with_all_details, get_project_by_id, create_project, update_project for linked project changed
feat(log): Added output processing of the change log
fix(log): Fix indentation issue in source code.
fix(projects): Fixed thrift timeout by optimizing projects loading
fix(rest): Optimize rest api for get project by tag, type, group
fix(ui): Restrict visibility of each component/release like Project
feat(project): Added  vendor for project
Merge pull request #1447 from siemens/feat/vendorForProject
feat(exportExcel): Send an email to user with download link once export completed
feat(export): Enable mailing for exported spreadsheet for components
feat(UI): ModifiedOn & MOdifiedBy fields for Project/COmponent/Release
Merge pull request #1539 from siemens/feat/ModifiedOnAndModifiedByFields-1479
fix(closedproject): Fixed issue w.r.t. editing close project
feature(ui) : select your group in Project page by grid
Merge pull request #1575 from KoukiHama/department-search
feat(SPDX): Use new SPDX library (#1496)
feat(CRUI):Change CR state 'On Hold' to 'Awaiting Response' & edit PreferredClearingDate
fix(ProjectUI): Changing Project group should update CR
fix(UI): unset few field while create a duplicate in project and component
Merge pull request #1756 from siemens/fix/duplicationInProductAndComponent
feat(svm): Publish SVM codes to Community
fix(UI): Error when creating/editing duplicate project/component/release
feat(rest) : Update data without moderation request And This features' a configurable setting

timeline.author: JaideepPalit

commits_in_main.message: Merge commit
feat(ProjectTodo): Remove ProjectTodo and UI changes for Obligation and ProjectTodo
fix(Report): Fixed Clearing report to show project, component, organisation obligation
feat(projectEdit): Project creators and moderators can edit few fields in a closed project
feat(Obligation): Add License Obligation from License Database based on licenses found in accepted attachments in Release and its LicenseInfo attachmentUsage in Project
feat(ui-licenseobligation): License obligation changes
fix(LicenseInfo): Optimized loading of license info, source code download, Clearing report page
fix(readmeossdownload): Null pointer while downloading readme_oss
fix(RequestUi):BU & ProjectName not loading for Closed CR table

feat(SVM): Added new field enableSvm(Default value - true) for linked project.   * Request/Response structure of get_projects_with_all_details, get_project_by_id, create_project, update_project for linked project changed
feat(rest): Added rest api to create duplicate of project
fix(ui): Restrict visibility of each component/release like Project
fix(Obligation): Save Admin Level Obligation based on Obligation topic
Fix (Release): Fixed vulnerability can't be deleted when it is linked with a deleted release
fix(closedproject): Fixed issue w.r.t. editing close project
upd(sanitize): Remove lib prefix from datahandler
